title: Few-shot medical relation extraction via prompt tuning enhanced pre-trained language model
abstract: Medical relation extraction is crucial for developing structured information to support intelligent healthcare systems. However, acquiring large volumes of labeled medical data is challenging due to the specialized nature of medical knowledge and privacy …

title: Calling a Spade a Heart: Gaslighting Multimodal Large Language Models via Negation
details: B Zhu, Y Gui, J Chen, CW Ngo, EP Lim - arXiv preprint arXiv:2501.19017, 2025
abstract: Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) have exhibited remarkable advancements in integrating different modalities, excelling in complex understanding and generation tasks. Despite their success, MLLMs remain vulnerable to …
